coupon_title: Free Gift Cards For Installing App
coupon_text: Nielsen (market research company: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nielsen_Corporation) have a market research opportunity where they will give you gift cards for installing their market research app on your phone/computer which monitors internet usage. Sign up & install the app and you automatically get points that you exchange for gift cards!You can earn points that can be redeemed for physical items as well as digital gift cards and vouchers. We will credit your account with points after you have successfully installed and configured at least one device. It may take up to 7 working days for us to acknowledge your participation and credit your account.By actively participating in the panel with at least one mobile device (or tablet) and one PC (or Mac) you can receive over Â£60 per year.
